## å¿«é€Ÿé–‹å§‹

```bash
cd /path/to/redmine/plugins
git clone https://github.com/bluer1211/redmine-testcase-management.git testcase_management
cd ..
bundle install
bin/rails redmine:plugins:migrate RAILS_ENV=production
```
